MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Measure(valuetype System.Windows.Size availableSize) cil managed

param.name: availableSize
param.span: 可供父項目用來配置子項目的空間。

span.span: The available space that a parent element can allocate a child element.

param.span: 子項目可以要求比可用空間更大的空間；如果在目前項目的內容模型中能夠捲動，就可能容納提供的大小。

span.span: A child element can request a larger space than what is available; the provided size might be accommodated if scrolling is possible in the content model for the current element.

summary.span: 更新 的 。

span.span: Updates the of a .

summary.span: 父項目從本身的 實作中呼叫此方法，以形成遞迴配置更新。

span.span: Parent elements call this method from their own implementations to form a recursive layout update.

summary.span: 呼叫此方法即構成配置更新的第一次傳遞 (「量值」傳遞)。

span.span: Calling this method constitutes the first pass (the "Measure" pass) of a layout update.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算版面配置定位[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]組成呼叫和呼叫。Computation of layout positioning in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] is comprised of a call and an call. 期間呼叫時，項目決定其大小需求使用`availableSize`輸入。During the call, an element determines its size requirements by using an `availableSize` input. 期間完成呼叫時，項目大小。During the call, the element size is finalized. `availableSize` 可為任何介於 0 到無限。`availableSize` can be any number from zero to infinite. 參與配置的項目應該會傳回最小他們需要指定`availableSize`。Elements participating in layout should return the minimum they require for a given `availableSize`. 當第一次執行個體化的版面配置時，它一律會收到之前，先呼叫。When a layout is first instantiated, it always receives a call before . 不過之後第一次的版面配置傳遞，, 它可能會收到呼叫，而不; 這種情形只會影響的屬性時變更 （例如對齊），或是當父系收到沒有.However, after the first layout pass, it may receive an call without a ; this can happen when a property that affects only is changed (such as alignment), or when the parent receives an without a . A呼叫會自動失效呼叫。A call will automatically invalidate an call. 如此主執行緒沒有在等待每個可能的配置變更，會以非同步方式發生配置更新。Layout updates happen asynchronously, such that the main thread is not waiting for every possible layout change. 查詢透過程式碼後置檢查屬性值的項目可能不會立即反映變更互動的調整大小或版面配置特性的屬性 (內容，例如)。Querying an element via code-behind checking of property values may not immediately reflect changes to properties that interact with the sizing or layout characteristics (the property, for example). > [!NOTE] > 版面配置更新可以強制使用方法。Layout updates can be forced by using the method. 不過，呼叫這個方法通常不需要而且可能會導致效能不佳。However, calling this method is usually unnecessary and can cause poor performance. 版面配置系統會保留兩個不同的佇列，不正確的版面配置，一個用於，另一個用於。The layout system keeps two separate queues of invalid layouts, one for and one for . 配置的佇列會根據執行配置; 元素的視覺化樹狀結構中的項目順序排序在樹狀結構中較高的項目是佇列的頂端，以避免重複的變更，在父代所造成的備援配置。The layout queue is sorted based upon the order of elements in the visual tree of the element performing layout; elements higher in the tree are at the top of the queue, to avoid redundant layouts caused by repeated changes in parents. 自動從佇列中移除重複的項目，如果他們已驗證配置的項目會自動會從佇列移除。Duplicate entries are automatically removed from the queue, and elements are automatically removed from the queue if they are already layout-validated. 更新配置時佇列清空第一，後面接著佇列。When updating layout, the queue is emptied first, followed by the queue. 中的項目中的項目時，就永遠不會排列佇列佇列。An element in the queue will never be arranged if there is an element in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Size MeasureCore(valuetype System.Windows.Size availableSize) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function MeasureCore (availableSize As Size) As Size
abstract member MeasureCore : System.Windows.Size -> System.Windows.Size override this.MeasureCore : System.Windows.Size -> System.Windows.Size

param.name: availableSize
param.span: 父項目可以配置給子項目使用的大小。

span.span: The available size that the parent element can allocate for the child.

summary.span: 任一項目在衍生類別中被覆寫時，會提供可以正確調整該項目的度量邏輯，並且也會同時考慮所有子項目內容的大小。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, provides measurement logic for sizing this element properly, with consideration of the size of any child element content.

returns.span: 這個項目在配置中需要的大小。

span.span: The desired size of this element in layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的項目，從較常見而非。It is more common to derive an element from rather than . 如果您衍生自，請注意，覆寫上標誌方法。If you are deriving from , note that an override of on seals the method. 因此，您只能覆寫做為改變配置量值的特性，如果您衍生自透過不包含繼承。Therefore, you only override as a means to alter layout measure characteristics if you derive from through an inheritance that does not include . 如果您嘗試上建置您自己的實作，這可能是大小寫[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心層級。This might be the case if you are attempting to build your own implementation on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core-level. 否則，如果您衍生自，則量值的行為的實作範本實作。Otherwise, if you are deriving from , then the implementation template for Measure behavior is the implementation of .. 父項目具有子元素必須呼叫上每個子系，否則這些子元素不調整大小或排列配置就會有效地消失。A parent element with child elements must call on each child, otherwise these child elements are not sized or arranged and will effectively disappear from layout. ## Examples 典型的覆寫遵循這個近似的模式 (沒有內建集合，稱為`VisualChildren`;`VisualChildren`是一個預留位置，表示您的項目會維護任何子系集合)。A typical override of follows this approximate pattern (there is not a built-in collection called `VisualChildren`; `VisualChildren` is a placeholder that represents whatever child collection your element maintains). [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#UIElementMeasureOverride](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementmeasureoverride)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementMeasureOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementmeasureoverride)] - 您必須呼叫每個子項目上。You must call on each child element. - 一般而言，您的實作應該快取之間的度量資訊和方法會呼叫相同的項目中。Generally, your implementation should cache measurement information between the and method calls in the same element. - 呼叫的基底實作並非必要，但可能適用的基底實作會提供所需的版面配置功能。Calling base implementations of is not required, but might be appropriate if the base implementation provides a desired layout capability. - 呼叫子系上項目應該傳遞相同`availableSize`身為其父代或區域的子集，根據的配置類型的父項目支援。Calls to on child elements should pass either the same `availableSize` as the parent, or a subset of the area, depending on the type of layout the parent element supports. 比方說，它會有效移除項目專用框線或邊框距離、 捲軸，或自訂控制項的區域。For example, it would be valid to remove the area for an element-specific border or padding, a scrollbar, or a custom control.

para.span: 實作必須能夠處理提供給值，為無限。

span.span: Implementations must be able to process a value provided for that is infinite.

para.span: 無限值表示沒有所要求的條件約束，而實際上會延遲到父項目，透過遞迴呼叫量值的度量選擇。

span.span: An infinite value indicates no requested constraints, and effectively defers measurement choice to the parent element, through recursive Measure calls.

para.span: 實作可以考慮針對提供的值是軟式條件約束。

span.span: Implementations can consider the value provided for to be a soft constraint.

para.span: 子元素可能會指定較大的大小，即使應用程式程式碼的其他層面能夠判斷目前的實際大小的父項目。

span.span: The child element might specify a larger size, even if other aspects of application code were able to determine the current actual size of the parent element.

para.span: 大型要求是指出子項目會查詢父元素是否可以支援顯示內容區域內的內容捲動的慣例。

span.span: The large size request is a convention that indicates that the child element is querying whether your parent element can support content scrolling within a content display region.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 指標在此元素上方且按下任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起或，對應到其中的兩個標準的滑鼠按鈕按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 並也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，並適當按鈕特有的事件引發時事件到達事件路由中的此項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控制項可能會繼承類別處理滑鼠按鈕的事件。Some controls might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 滑鼠左的按鈕向下事件是最可能的事件，讓控制項中的類別處理。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 類別處理，通常會將標示基礎為已處理的類別事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦被標示為已處理，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該項目。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 也不通常會引發任何其他類別或執行個體處理常式附加至事件反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解決的問題，在上述的重要概述，並仍收到滑鼠左的按鈕向下事件已處理就使用任一這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加的處理常式未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 請注意，因為這是預覽事件，路由從根目錄開始，並向下控制項。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式，然後選擇 [簽章] 選項，可讓處理常式來接聽事件，即使它們已經標示為已處理路由的事件資料中。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseEnter As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標進入此元素的邊界時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，會使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發路由;相反地，它們會以處理相同的項目引發的狀況。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如樣式中的事件觸發程序的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然播放軌，當滑鼠指標進入範圍的項目，這個事件更多解譯為常值回報屬性值已從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. A (或任何衍生類別) 可原生處理按鈕具有焦點，並按下的按鍵是空格鍵時的事件。A (or any derived class) has native handling for a event when the button has focus, and the pressed key is the space bar. 原生處理引發作為來源，按鈕的事件，即使將滑鼠指標似乎未移動，也會擷取滑鼠。The native handling raises the event with the button as the source, and also captures the mouse, even though the mouse pointer does not appear to move. 因滑鼠捕捉，而與做為來源按鈕也會引發事件。As a result of the mouse capture, a event is also raised with the button as the source. 一般而言，如果項目捕捉滑鼠，然後就會引發，以及和可能是其他控制項特定事件。In general, if an element captures the mouse, then is raised, as well as and possibly other control-specific events. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseEnterEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseEnterEvent As RoutedEvent

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠左按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這種現象可能會遵循事件反昇路由項目樹狀結構，實際上是直接路由的事件的引發並由每個項目樹狀結構中沿著 reraised 。Although this seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕的細節有基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件;不過，必須新增的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確呼叫，選項來處理已標示為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您基本上將標示處理路由中的所有進一步的接聽程式和所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能包含的類別處理常式產生事件這類。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 就概念而言，將此事件 (和其他的滑鼠按鍵事件，對於) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (使用所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件會新增不需要檢查原始的滑鼠事件，事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 針對更進階的案例，例如檢查狀態的標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別，而這些非上。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控制項類別可能具有固有處理按鈕的滑鼠事件的類別。Some control classes might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 滑鼠左的按鈕向下事件是最可能的事件，讓控制項中的類別處理。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 類別處理，通常會將標示基礎為已處理的類別事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦被標示為已處理，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該項目。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 也不通常會引發任何其他類別或執行個體處理常式附加至事件反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解決的問題，在上述的重要概述，並仍收到滑鼠左的按鈕向下事件已處理就使用任一這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加的處理常式未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 請注意，因為這是預覽事件，路由從根目錄開始，並向下控制項。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式，然後選擇 [簽章] 選項，可讓處理常式來接聽事件，即使它們已經標示為已處理路由的事件資料中。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseRightButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠右按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這種現象可能會遵循事件反昇路由項目樹狀結構，實際上是直接路由的事件的引發並由每個項目樹狀結構中沿著 reraised 。Although this seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕的細節有基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件;不過，必須新增的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確呼叫，選項來處理已標示為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您基本上將標示處理路由中的所有進一步的接聽程式和所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能包含的類別處理常式產生事件這類。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 就概念而言，將此事件 (和其他的滑鼠按鍵事件，對於) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (使用所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件會新增不需要檢查原始的滑鼠事件，事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 針對更進階的案例，例如檢查狀態的標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別，而這些非上。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . 向右按鈕的滑鼠事件中通常會有原生處理的應用程式案例。Right button mouse events frequently have native handling in application scenarios. 比方說，向下的滑鼠右按鈕可能會顯示內容功能表。For instance, a right mouse button down might display a context menu. 請參閱[ContextMenu 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md)。See [ContextMenu Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起或，對應至其中的兩個標準的滑鼠按鈕的版本。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a release of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 並也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，並適當按鈕特有的事件引發時事件到達事件路由中的此項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉會優先於滑鼠指標的所在;因此，如果您收到焦點或擷取的項目中的事件，將滑鼠指標可能實際上是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive the event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

param.name: request
param.span: 包含屬性的周遊要求，該屬性指出在現有定位順序中周遊的模式，或以視覺化方式移動的方向。

span.span: A traversal request, which contains a property that indicates either a mode to traverse in existing tab order, or a direction to move visually.

summary.span: 嘗試將焦點從這個項目移至另一個項目。

span.span: Attempts to move focus from this element to another element.

summary.span: 移動焦點的方向是由指引方向所指定，該指引方向是在這個項目之視覺化父代的組織內解譯。

span.span: The direction to move focus is specified by a guidance direction, which is interpreted within the organization of the visual parent for this element.

returns.span: 如果已執行要求的周遊則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the requested traversal was performed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請確定您檢查傳回的值，這個方法。Make sure you check the return value of this method. 傳回值為`false`如果周遊時碰到控制項的組合所定義的定位停駐點，並周遊要求並未要求要包裝，可能會傳回。A return value of `false` might be returned if the traversal runs into a tab stop that is defined by a control's composition, and the traversal request did not request to wrap.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAccessKey(class System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnAccessKey (e As AccessKeyEventArgs)
abstract member OnAccessKey : System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs -> unit override this.OnAccessKey : System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 便捷鍵事件的事件資料。

span.span: The event data to the access key event.

param.span: 該事件資料會報告叫用哪個便捷鍵，並指出控制這些事件之傳送的 物件，是否也會將這個便捷鍵引動過程傳送至其他項目。

span.span: The event data reports which key was invoked, and indicate whether the object that controls the sending of these events also sent this access key invocation to other elements.

summary.span: 當叫用對這個項目有意義的便捷鍵 (Access Key) 時，為其提供類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for when an access key that is meaningful for this element is invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在任何實際 AccessKey 事件類別，或其他位置，您可以引發，或附加的處理常式。There is no actual AccessKey event in the class, or elsewhere, which you can raise or attach handlers for. 相反地，透過專用的管理員類別，產生事件後, 置處理所有的輸入来搜尋適用於整個輸入模型的存取金鑰。Instead, the event is originated via a dedicated manager class, , which post-processes all input to search for access keys that are applicable to the entire input model.

para.span: 在這個方法的預設實作設定鍵盤焦點設定至這個項目 (藉由呼叫)。

span.span: The default implementation of this method in sets keyboard focus to this element (by calling ).

para.span: 如果它們是可設定焦點，因為它是針對協助工具案例的預期的行為，實作應永久保存此行為。

span.span: Implementations should perpetuate this behavior if they are focusable, because it is an expected behavior for accessibility scenarios.

para.span: 請注意，基底實作不使用傳遞的事件資料執行任何動作，而且會引發任何進一步的事件;它只會將焦點。

span.span: Note that the base implementation does nothing with the passed event data and raises no further event; it just sets the focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnChildDesiredSizeChanged(class System.Windows.UIElement child) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnChildDesiredSizeChanged (child As UIElement)
abstract member OnChildDesiredSizeChanged : System.Windows.UIElement -> unit override this.OnChildDesiredSizeChanged : System.Windows.UIElement -> unit

param.name: child
param.span: 正在調整大小的子項目。

span.span: The child element that is being resized.

summary.span: 會在調整子項目的大小時支援配置行為。

span.span: Supports layout behavior when a child element is resized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的應用程式程式碼通常不呼叫這個方法。This method is typically not called by your application code. 它會公開讓衍生的類別可以進行進一步的項目檢查其本身可能是無效的配置狀態。It is exposed so that derived element classes can make further checks on their own possibly invalid layout state. 類別可能也會嘗試最佳化，以根據子項目大小變更版面配置階段的處理時間降至最低。Classes could also attempt optimizations to minimize the processing time for a layout pass based on size changes to child elements. 範例衍生項目類別可實作是控制項。An example derived element class that implements is the control.

para.span: 方法具有呼叫的預設實作本身。

span.span: The method has the default implementation of calling on itself.

para.span: 一般實作會是： 執行任何最佳化您自己的項目支援，並接著通常呼叫基底至少其中一個程式碼分支 （表示 「 中途 」 的狀態，每個快取邏輯自己的量值的一個）。

span.span: A typical implementation would be: do whatever optimization your own element supports, and then typically call base from at least one of the code branches (the one that indicated "dirty" state per your own measure caching logic).

para.span: 這個方法只會呼叫在版面配置，處理時的子系本身發出大小變更。

span.span: This method is only called in the layout processing if it was the child itself that originated the size changes.

para.span: 否則，如果父項目會起始傳遞，版面配置系統規則，根據父代會重新計算版面配置已。

span.span: Otherwise, if the parent element initiates the pass, according to the layout system rules, the parent is recalculating layout already.

para.span: 版面配置系統會處理子系的父系，順序的版面配置，因此是必要的子元素的版面配置呼叫沒有傳回父項目調整大小。

span.span: The layout system processes layout in the order of child-to-parent, so no return to parent element sizing from the child element layout calls is necessary.

summary.span: 為 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構傳回類別特定的 實作。

span.span: Returns class-specific implementations for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

returns.span: 因型別而異的 實作。

span.span: The type-specific implementation.

para.span: 此方法的實作會在呼叫特定的建構函式通常是實作，並將它傳回為傳回值。

span.span: The implementation of this method is typically to call the constructor of a specific implementation, and return it as the return value.

para.span: 所有衍生的類別應該實作這個方法，以提供自己的特定實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]基礎結構。

span.span: All derived classes should implement this method in order to provide their own specific implementations to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

para.span: 如需實作此模式的詳細資訊，請參閱。

span.span: For details on implementing this pattern, see .

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

Protected Overridable Sub OnDragLeave (e As DragEventArgs)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: e

span.span: A that contains event data.

param.span: 此事件資料必須包含 事件的識別項。

span.span: This event data must contain the identifier for the event.

summary.span: 使用所提供的事件資料引發 路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 這在 \* 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作是在內部叫用來引發事件時屬性值變更。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理該事件的實作。The implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.

para.span: 除非您有不會引發焦點事件變成故意或不尋常的需要，請確定您的實作會呼叫基底實作。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否則，通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目設定成為可設定焦點至。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 提供 路由事件的類別處理，而這個事件會在擷取到對此項目的觸控時發生。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a touch is captured to this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法有沒有預設的實作。The method has no default implementation. 覆寫衍生類別來處理在事件。Override in a derived class to handle the event. 請務必呼叫基底類別方法的基底類別，因此可接收事件。Be sure to call the base class' method so that base classes receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個虛擬方法，就會引發時的值相依性屬性變更。This virtual method is raised when the value of the dependency property changes. 虛擬方法會先引發，並可以操作為必要的事件資料。The virtual method is raised first and can manipulate the event data as necessary. 則與該相同的事件資料執行個體就會引發事件。Then the event is raised with that same event data instance. 請注意，事件就不會路由的事件。Notice that the event is not a routed event. 因此，您無法將它標示為已處理的類別處理常式中。Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後您的特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵輸入是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴按鍵，例如，輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵輸入。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果這些輸入系統功能將事件標示為已處理，然後不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, then is not invoked. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵輸入是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴按鍵，例如，輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵輸入。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果這些輸入系統功能將事件標示為已處理，然後不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, then is not invoked. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

param.name: e

span.span: A that contains event data.

param.span: 此事件資料必須包含 事件的識別項。

span.span: This event data must contain the identifier for the event.

summary.span: 使用所提供的事件資料引發 路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data that is provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 這在 \* 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作是在內部叫用來引發事件時屬性值變更。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 這項實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理該事件的實作。This implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.

para.span: 除非您有不會引發焦點事件變成故意或不尋常的需要，請確定您的實作會呼叫基底實作。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否則，通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目設定成為可設定焦點至。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

param.name: e

span.span: The that contains the event data.

param.span: 此事件資料會報告有關按下的滑鼠按鈕以及已處理狀態的詳細資訊。

span.span: This event data reports details about the mouse button that was pressed and the handled state.

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕的動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會叫用動作的處理常式之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能 mark為已處理的事件不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式將事件標示為已處理時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會發生在接收端的項目上時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您將標示為已處理的類別中處理這個事件時，仍然會引發子;不過，它們會傳遞事件資料中的處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果類別處理在處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用具有`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用除非那些類別處理常式向簽章`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，當其中隱含類別處理負責動作下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行為可能會不必要的;因此，小心時將事件標記為已處理的情況下，您在使用這個虛擬方法。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個特定按鈕的直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法;請考慮是否覆寫這些特定按鈕的類別處理常式可能更適合。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後您的特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件，提供直接的路由策略。In this case the matching event is a routed event, with a direct routing strategy. 將事件標示為已處理時仍適用於防止一般的執行個體處理常式 (未指定的指`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing the typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 似乎事件反昇路由事件，但實際上會以間接方式傳送。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是路由傳送，泡泡圖的基礎事件和每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理結果來引發直接路由的事件。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記事件為已處理的這個項目的用途，已處理的狀態不保存事件路由中的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標示為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (未指定的指`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫此邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 不論您選擇呼叫的基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期要叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生，並覆寫在您的衍生類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作中，不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕的動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會叫用動作的處理常式之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能 mark為已處理的事件不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式將事件標示為已處理時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您將標示為已處理的類別中處理這個事件時，仍然會引發子;不過，它們會傳遞事件資料中的處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果類別處理在處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用具有`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用除非那些類別處理常式向簽章`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，當其中隱含類別處理負責處理動作的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行為可能會不必要的;因此，小心時將事件標記為已處理的情況下，您在使用這個虛擬方法。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個特定按鈕的直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法;請考慮是否覆寫這些特定按鈕的類別處理常式可能更適合。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPreviewDragLeave(class System.Windows.DragEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnPreviewDragLeave (e As DragEventArgs)
abstract member OnPreviewDragLeave : System.Windows.DragEventArgs -> unit override this.OnPreviewDragLeave : System.Windows.DragEventArgs -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加路由事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕的動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會叫用動作的處理常式之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能 mark為已處理的事件不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式將事件標示為已處理時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會發生在接收端的項目上時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您將標示為已處理的類別中處理這個事件時，仍然會引發子;不過，它們會傳遞事件資料中的處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果類別處理在處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用具有`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用除非那些類別處理常式向簽章`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，當其中隱含類別處理負責動作下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行為可能會不必要的;因此，小心時將事件標記為已處理的情況下，您在使用這個虛擬方法。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個特定按鈕的直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法;請考慮是否覆寫這些特定按鈕的類別處理常式可能更適合。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件似乎旅遊通道的路由，但實際上會以間接方式傳送。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理結果來引發直接路由的事件。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記事件為已處理的這個項目的用途，已處理的狀態不保存事件路由中的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標示為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (未指定的指`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫此邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 不論您選擇呼叫的基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期要叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生，並覆寫在您的衍生類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作中，不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕的動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會叫用動作的處理常式之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能 mark為已處理的事件不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式將事件標示為已處理時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您將標示為已處理的類別中處理這個事件時，仍然會引發子;不過，它們會傳遞事件資料中的處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果類別處理在處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用具有`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用除非那些類別處理常式向簽章`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，當其中隱含類別處理負責處理動作的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行為可能會不必要的;因此，小心時將事件標記為已處理的情況下，您在使用這個虛擬方法。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個特定按鈕的直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法;請考慮是否覆寫這些特定按鈕的類別處理常式可能更適合。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRender(class System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext drawingContext) cil managed
abstract member OnRender : System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext -> unit override this.OnRender : System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext -> unit

param.name: drawingContext

span.span: The drawing instructions for a specific element.

param.span: 此內容會提供給配置系統。

span.span: This context is provided to the layout system.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，參與由配置系統導向的呈現作業。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.

summary.span: 這個項目的呈現指令不會在叫用此方法時直接使用，而是會加以保留，以便稍後由配置和繪圖做非同步使用。

span.span: The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有預設的實作類別。This method has no default implementation in the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的面板衍生類別可能的實作。The following code example shows a possible implementation for a panel derived class. [!code-csharp[LightWeightCustomPanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LightWeightCustomPanel/CSharp/OffsetPanel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LightWeightCustomPanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LightWeightCustomPanel/visualbasic/offsetpanel.vb#1)]

para.span: 方法可以覆寫上新增更多 （先前未定義邏輯樹狀結構中） 的圖形化元素要呈現的項目，例如效果或裝飾項。

span.span: The method can be overridden to add further graphical elements (not previously defined in a logical tree) to a rendered element, such as effects or adorners.

para.span: A物件會傳遞做為引數會提供方法來繪製圖形、 文字、 影像或影片。

span.span: A object is passed as an argument, which provides methods for drawing shapes, text, images or videos.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnRenderSizeChanged (System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo info);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRenderSizeChanged(class System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo info) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnRenderSizeChanged (info As SizeChangedInfo)
abstract member OnRenderSizeChanged : System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo -> unit override this.OnRenderSizeChanged : System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo -> unit

param.name: info
param.span: 封裝的參數 ()，其中包含舊和新的大小，而且其中的維度實際上會變更。

span.span: The packaged parameters (), which includes old and new sizes, and which dimension actually changes.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，參與由配置系統導向的呈現作業。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.

summary.span: 如果項目的 因配置更新而改變，則會在版面配置更新之後，並在呈現前叫用這個方法。

span.span: This method is invoked after layout update, and before rendering, if the element's has changed as a result of layout update.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 典型的 WPF 架構層級項目會使用從覆寫實作。A typical WPF framework-level element uses the override implementation from . 實作失效和屬性和控制代碼的改造版面配置的基本概念。The implementation invalidates the and properties and handles the basics of remaking the layout. 覆寫在層級意味著，您的項目實作故意不使用的 WPF 架構層級實作，因此您的項目必須配置邏輯更直接處理，通常是藉由撰寫替代版面配置系統。Overriding at the level implies that your element implementation is deliberately not using the WPF framework-level implementation, and therefore your element must handle layout logic more directly, typically by writing a replacement layout system.

On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後您的特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 將事件標示為已處理時仍適用於防止一般的執行個體處理常式 (未指定的指`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
