MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Windows.Localizability(System.Windows.LocalizationCategory.None, Readability=System.Windows.Readability.Unreadable)

summary.span: 取得或設定套用至整個 (在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中呈現時) 的不透明度因數。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity factor applied to the entire when it is rendered in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 不透明度因素。

span.span: The opacity factor.

value.span: 預設不透明度為 1.0。

span.span: Default opacity is 1.0.

value.span: 值必須介於 0.0 到 1.0 之間。

span.span: Expected values are between 0.0 and 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 1.0 的預設值是提供初始的中繼資料，在此相依性屬性的預設值類別。The 1.0 default value is the default provided by the initial metadata of this dependency property on the class. 其他衍生的類別可能可以藉由覆寫其類別建構函式內的中繼資料變更此預設值。Other derived classes may potentially change this default value by overriding the metadata from within their class constructor. 值不會套用至實際的配置中，除非也是可見的項目 (是`true`)。The value of won't be applied to actual layout unless the element is also visible ( is `true`). 會套用至從父項目在元素樹狀結構子項目，但巢狀的不透明度設定並不表示在個別的子元素的屬性值的顯示效果。 is applied from parent elements on down the element tree to child elements, but the visible effects of the nested opacity settings aren't indicated in the property value of individual child elements. 比方說，如果清單有 50%(0.5) 的不透明度，其中一個清單項目有其本身設為 20%(0.2) 的不透明度，net 可見的不透明度，該清單項目將呈現如同它是 10%(0.1)，但屬性值的清單項目屬性仍會是 0.2 查詢時。For instance, if a list has a 50% (0.5) opacity and one of its list items has its own opacity set to 20% (0.2), the net visible opacity for that list item will be rendered as if it were 10% (0.1), but the property value of the list item property would still be 0.2 when queried. 即使宣告或評估的不透明度為 0，項目仍參與輸入的事件和命令，並可能可設定焦點。Even if the declared or evaluated opacity is 0, an element still participates in input events and commands, and is potentially focusable. 這方面很有用，例如您可以使用不透明度為零的物件 （例如圖形），加上遮罩時以透明的項目基礎物件。This aspect can be useful, for instance you can use an opacity-zero object (such as a shape) for masking underlying objects with transparent elements. 不透明度為零的物件，然後可處理所有輸入的事件處理基礎的區域。The opacity-zero object can then handle all the input event processing for an underlying area. 不過，`Background`或是`Fill`之物件的圖形應該設定為值，即使它是，否則為未啟用點擊測試，並沒收到任何事件。However, the `Background` or `Fill` of the object or shape should be set to a value, even if it is , otherwise hit testing is not enabled, and no events are received. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ OpacityMask { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };
member this.OpacityMask : System.Windows.Media.Brush with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定套用至任何 Alpha 色板遮罩 (用來遮住此項目的呈現內容) 時實作 的不透明度遮罩。

span.span: Gets or sets an opacity mask, as a implementation that is applied to any alpha-channel masking for the rendered content of this element.

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 用於不透明度遮罩的筆刷。

span.span: The brush to use for opacity masking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會使用 alpha 色頻值會提供任何。This property only uses whatever the alpha channel value is for the supplied . 其他通道的的呈現的內容 （紅色、 綠色或藍色） 會被忽略。The other channels of the 's rendered content (Red, Green, or Blue) are ignored. 最常見針對此目的，是，它可以用於各種不同的遮罩的技術，例如插文的相片。The most typical for this purpose is an , which can be used for a variety of photo masking techniques such as a vignette. 但任何已定義(例如) 可用。But any defined (such as ) can be used. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，這個屬性值可以使用的每個實作特有的內嵌語法抽象類別。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property value can use an inline syntax that is specific to each implementation of the abstract class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用純色和漸層概觀繪製](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md)。For more information, see [Painting with Solid Colors and Gradients Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列標記範例示範套用至另一個的不透明度遮罩。The following markup example shows an opacity mask applied to another . [!code-xaml[OpacityMasksSnippet#UIElementOpacityMask](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpacityMasksSnippet/CS/ImageBrushExample.xaml#uielementopacitymask)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可唯一識別每個項目。 uniquely identifies each element. 項目不會改變每次相同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]載入 （包括二進位表示法）。An element keeps the same every time the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is loaded (including binary representations). 這個識別碼用於內部的載入、 剖析和序列化需求。This identifier is used for internal loading, parsing and serialization requirements. 它不是可供您的應用程式程式碼。It is not intended to be used by your application code. 這個屬性沒有任何關聯性任何給定的執行個體的結果。This property has no relationship to the result for any given instance.

summary.span: 鍵盤不再以此元素為焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is no longer focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於這個事件會使用通道路由，失去焦點的項目可能的子項目，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses tunneling routing, the element that lost focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 檢查事件資料來判斷實際失去焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost focus. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewLostKeyboardFocusEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewLostKeyboardFocusEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 指標在此元素上方且按下任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起或，對應到其中的兩個標準的滑鼠按鈕按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 並也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，並適當按鈕特有的事件引發時事件到達事件路由中的此項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠左按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這種現象可能遵循通道的路由項目樹狀結構，實際上是直接路由的事件的引發並由每個項目樹狀結構中沿著 reraised 。Although this seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕的細節有基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件;不過，必須新增的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確呼叫，選項來處理已標示為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您基本上將標示處理路由中的所有進一步的接聽程式和所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能包含的類別處理常式產生事件這類。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 就概念而言，將此事件 (和其他的滑鼠按鍵事件，對於) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (使用所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件會新增不需要檢查原始的滑鼠事件，事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 針對更進階的案例，例如檢查狀態的標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別，而這些非上。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當發生這個事件都將滑鼠指標第一次進入項目的範圍中，也當滑鼠指標移動同時仍保有的項目範圍內。This event occurs both when the mouse pointer first enters into the element bounds, and also when the mouse pointer moves while still remaining within the element bounds. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseUp As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且放開任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起或，對應到其中的兩個標準的滑鼠按鈕按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 並也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，並適當按鈕特有的事件引發時事件到達事件路由中的此項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseUpEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且使用者滾動滑鼠滾輪時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉會優先於滑鼠指標的所在;因此，如果您接收這個事件的焦點或擷取的項目時，滑鼠指標實際上可能是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 此元素以一種與裝置無關的方式取得文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓元件或應用程式以與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是主要的方法; 不過也可以產生語音、 手寫和其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of ; but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also generate . 因為索引鍵組合-在預設鍵盤或輸入的法編輯器-透過多個索引鍵的事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations - either in default keyboards or through input method editors - multiple key events may raise just one text input event. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 手指在這個項目上方且在螢幕上觸控時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指觸控螢幕，並移動之前不會發生的事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住卻不必移動它會使用按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住不放的行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 會造成並事件發生在手指觸控螢幕，如設定; 附加屬性`false`此元素。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。The event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryCursor As QueryCursorEventHandler

summary.span: 要求顯示游標時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: 每當滑鼠指標移動至新位置時，都會引發此事件，這意謂游標物件可能會根據其新位置而變更。

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 此事件名稱所參考的資料指標不一定是文字游標 （有時稱為插入點）。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反地，此內容中的資料指標是宣告螢幕上的圖形化顯示數個可能的輸入相關的裝置或在 Windows 程式設計的概念相關的物件。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in Windows programming. 該物件由在 WPF 中的類別。That object is represented by the class in WPF. WPF 輸入的系統可讓您變更這個資料指標，當它表示滑鼠指標的螢幕上的位置。The WPF input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 您可以使用預先定義的值從列舉型別，或者您可以宣告為影像檔的自訂游標。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 接聽事件就不會針對資料指標管理而有效率的技術。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反地，每個項目應該定義自己的資料指標行為和。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 您只應依賴如果您不使用 WPF 架構層級基底項目，或在異常的情況下，其中定義每個項目為基礎的資料指標的行為不符合您的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 如需有關實作資料指標行為，以回應，請參閱。For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有任何已定義的對應通道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaiseEvent(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed
abstract member RaiseEvent : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit override this.RaiseEvent : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: ，包含事件資料，也會識別要引發的事件。

span.span: A that contains the event data and also identifies the event to raise.

summary.span: 引發特定路由事件。

span.span: Raises a specific routed event.

summary.span: 要引發的 是在所提供的 執行個體內識別 (作為該事件資料的 屬性)。

span.span: The to be raised is identified within the instance that is provided (as the property of that event data).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `e`參數的型別為路由的事件的所有資料的通用基底類型; 不過，事件資料應該被授與為最特定的事件資料類型，可供所引發的事件，因為衍生的類別包含實際的特定資料是針對特定的事件時，會引發這個事件的屬性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 不是狀態屬性事件;它也會識別要引發哪個路由的事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引發的模式和路由的事件資料，同時與不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和資料類別，通常只包含事件相關的屬性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. ## Examples 下列範例會建立事件資料、 將事件識別碼附加至資料，然後引發自訂的路由的事件使用事件資料執行個體。The following example creates event data, appends the event identifier to the data, and then uses the event data instance to raise a custom routed event. [!code-csharp[RoutedEventCustom#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#raiseevent)] [!code-vb[RoutedEventCustom#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/VB/SDKSampleLibrary/Class1.vb#raiseevent)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的案例，使用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]是您實作時會[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]自訂路由事件，特別是當您實作在處理常式的 「 移除 」 邏輯時相關聯的 「 包裝函式 」 事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]層級。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 這個接下來的範例 < 備註 > 一節將說明此案例。The example that follows this remarks section illustrates this scenario. 如果沒有任何處理常式註冊以比對方法呼叫的輸入的參數的準則，則呼叫這個方法任何作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that matches the input parameters for the method call. 如果多個處理常式已連結的事件處理常式存放區中，比對準則，也就是第一個處理常式。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 此行為是配合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]行為`-=`運算子。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既不`routedEvent`也`handler`可能是`null`。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 嘗試提供其中一個值做為`null`會引發例外狀況。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 這個方法會忽略`handledEventsToo`加上第一個處理常式是否提供的參數資訊簽章，可讓已處理事件的處理。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 任一種類型的處理常式會移除。Either type of handler is removed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用事件包裝函式定義的一部分。The following example uses as part of an event wrapper definition. [!code-csharp[RoutedEventCustom#AddRemoveHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#addremovehandler)] [!code-vb[RoutedEventCustom#AddRemoveHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/VB/SDKSampleLibrary/Class1.vb#addremovehandler)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 請勿嘗試設定這個屬性，在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]或在程式碼，如果使用 WPF 架構層級配置系統。Do not attempt to set this property, either in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or in code, if using the WPF framework-level layout system. 幾乎所有的一般應用程式案例會使用此版面配置系統。Nearly all typical application scenarios will use this layout system. 版面配置系統將不會使用在設定的大小直接屬性。The layout system will not respect sizes set in the property directly. 屬性宣告為可寫入才能啟用特定 WPF 核心層級的橋接刻意避免一般版面配置通訊協定，例如支援的情況下類別。The property is declared writable only to enable certain WPF core-level bridging cases that deliberately circumvent the typical layout protocols, such as support for the class. 這個屬性可以用來檢查版面配置系統內適用的呈現大小會覆寫這類或。This property can be used for checking the applicable render size within layout system overrides such as or . 更常見的案例處理事件的類別處理常式覆寫或事件。A more common scenario is handling the event with the class handler override or the event. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用自訂裝飾項值，以便建立及調整大小的矩形圖形一部分中定義的裝飾項，其實作。The following example shows how a custom adorner uses the value in order to create and size the rectangle graphic that defines the adorner, as part of its implementation. [!code-csharp[AdornersMiscCode#UIElementDesiredSize](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AdornersMiscCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#uielementdesiredsize)] [!code-vb[AdornersMiscCode#UIElementDesiredSize](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AdornersMiscCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#uielementdesiredsize)]

summary.span: 取得或設定影響這個項目呈現位置的轉換資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets transform information that affects the rendering position of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈現轉換不會重新產生配置大小或呈現大小資訊。A render transform does not regenerate layout size or render size information. 呈現轉換通常是針對顯示動畫，或套用暫時效果的項目。Render transforms are typically intended for animating or applying a temporary effect to an element. 例如，項目可能會縮放已取得焦點或移轉，將滑鼠指標放或可能會在載入繪製該部分的眼睛抖動時[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。For example, the element might zoom when focused or moused over, or might jitter on load to draw the eye to that part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: The default value is a with coordinates (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有多少非標準方式使用結構中的值，不代表座標系統中的絕對位置。 has a somewhat nonstandard use of the structure value, in that the does not represent an absolute location in a coordinate system. 相反地，介於 0 和 1 之間的值會解譯為目前的項目，在每個 x，y 軸範圍的因素。Instead, values between 0 and 1 are interpreted as a factor for the range of the current element in each x,y axis. 例如，(0.5，0.5) 會呈現轉換至元素上置中或 (1，1) 會將呈現轉換底端右下角的項目。For example, (0.5,0.5) will cause the render transform to be centered on the element, or (1,1) would place the render transform at the bottom right corner of the element. 不是可接受的值。 is not an accepted value. 0 和 1 以外的值也已被接受，並會導致更多的非傳統的轉換效果。Values beyond 0 and 1 are also accepted, and will result in more unconventional transform effects. 比方說，如果您設定(5,5)，並接著套用，項目本身的範圍之外，也會旋轉的點。For instance, if you set to be (5,5), and then apply a , the rotation point will be well outside the bounds of the element itself. 轉換會旋轉您的項目源自右下角之外的大圓形。The transform will spin your element around in a big circle that originates beyond bottom right. 來源可能會在其父項目內的某處，並可能超出範圍或檢視表可能是。The origin might be somewhere inside its parent element and could possibly be possibly out of frame or view. 負數的點值類似，會產生超出左上方的界限。Negative point values are similar, these will go beyond the top left bounds. 呈現轉換不會影響版面配置，且通常用於動畫，或將暫存的效果套用至項目。Render transforms do not affect layout, and are typically used to animate or apply a temporary effect to an element. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *xOrigin**xOrigin* 水平的原始比例。The horizontal origin factor. 這通常是指定為介於 0 和 1 之間的值。This is typically given as a value between 0 and 1. 請參閱＜備註＞。See Remarks. *yOrigin**yOrigin* 垂直的原始比例。The vertical origin factor. 這通常是指定為介於 0 和 1 之間的值。This is typically given as a value between 0 and 1. 請參閱＜備註＞。See Remarks. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立在程式碼中的項目，適用於，然後再套用。The following example builds up elements in code, applies a , and then applies a . [!code-csharp[transformanimations_snip#UIElementRenderTransformOrigin](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/transformanimations_snip/CSharp/RotateAboutCenterExample.cs#uielementrendertransformorigin)] [!code-vb[transformanimations_snip#UIElementRenderTransformOrigin](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/transformanimations_snip/visualbasic/rotateaboutcenterexample.vb#uielementrendertransformorigin)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值判斷這個項目的呈現在呈現期間是否該使用裝置特定像素的設定。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性設定為`true`在您的根項目，若要啟用像素貼齊呈現整個 UI。You can set this property to `true` on your root element to enable pixel snap rendering throughout the UI. 適用於裝置以大於 96 操作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)]，像素貼齊呈現可以最小化元件單一單位實線附近的消除鋸齒視覺成品。For devices operating at greater than 96 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)], pixel snap rendering can minimize anti-aliasing visual artifacts in the vicinity of single-unit solid lines. 當繼承任何可能衍生的類別，或覆寫來設定此相依性屬性的中繼資料中繼資料屬性來`true`。When inherited by or any possible derived classes, overrides the metadata for this dependency property to set the metadata property to `true`. 這種做法是只最外層項目的子樹狀目錄中的必須指定做為`true`，然後將會報告該樹狀子目錄的所有子項目作為`true`，而且必須視覺效果。What this achieves is that only the outermost element in a subtree needs to specify as `true`, and all child elements of that subtree will then report as `true` and will have the visual effect. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

summary.span: 手寫筆進入此元素的邊界時發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，會使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發路由;相反地，它們會以處理相同的項目引發的狀況。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如樣式中的事件觸發程序的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然手寫筆輸入的項目，這個事件更多的界限時的追蹤記錄解譯為常值回報屬性值已從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會填入這個集合的控制項範例是。An example of a control that populates this collection is . 新增做為集合項目，可讓手寫筆輸入與互動，並產生唯一的呈現方式，以驅動事件的手寫筆的回應。 adds the as a collection item, which enables the to interact with stylus input and produce the unique rendering in response to stylus driven events. 如需建立自訂外掛程式，可以接收及解譯手寫筆輸入，請參閱 < [ 自手寫筆的 輸入攔截](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/intercepting-input-from-the-stylus.md)。For information on creating custom plug-ins that can receive and interpret stylus input, see [Intercepting Input from the Stylus](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/intercepting-input-from-the-stylus.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，並將它加入至處理控制項的自訂筆墨的集合。The following example creates a instance and adds it to the collection for a custom ink handling control. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 手寫筆筆勢的相關資訊的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about stylus gestures, see . 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextInput As TextCompositionEventHandler

summary.span: 此元素以一種與裝置無關的方式取得文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件可能已被標示為已處理的複合控制項的內部實作。This event might already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 請參閱下方的備註。See Remark below. 事件可能已被標示為已處理的複合控制項的內部實作。The event may already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 例如，是複合控制項，事件已標示為已處理，其複合 （compositing） 內。For example, a is a composited control where the event is already marked as handled; within its compositing. 控制項執行這項操作，因為控制項必須解譯某些類型的輸入，例如方向鍵，該控制項的特殊意義。Controls do this because the control needs to interpret some types of input, such as arrow keys, as having special meaning to that control. 如果您使用做為您用來附加文字輸入的處理常式的事件，您可能會收到更好的結果。If you use as the event where you attach handlers for text input, you may receive better results. 這項技術會規避大部分的情況下，其中已將這個事件標記為已處理控制項組合，而收到此事件路由事件時，防止您的處理常式。This technique circumvents most cases where control composition has already marked this event as handled and prevents your handler from receiving the event along the event route. 事件可讓元件或應用程式以與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是主要的方法，但也可以將語音、 手寫和其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 因為索引鍵組合-在預設鍵盤或輸入的法編輯器-透過多個索引鍵的事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations - either in default keyboards or through input method editors - multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指觸控螢幕，並移動之前不會發生的事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住卻不必移動它會使用按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住不放的行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 會造成並事件發生在手指觸控螢幕，如設定; 附加屬性`false`此元素。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Point TranslatePoint (System.Windows.Point point, System.Windows.UIElement relativeTo);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Point TranslatePoint(valuetype System.Windows.Point point, class System.Windows.UIElement relativeTo) cil managed
public: System::Windows::Point TranslatePoint(System::Windows::Point point, System::Windows::UIElement ^ relativeTo);

param.name: point
param.span: 相對於這個項目的點值。

span.span: The point value, as relative to this element.

param.name: relativeTo
param.span: 指定的點要轉換成的項目。

span.span: The element to translate the given point into.

summary.span: 將相對於這個項目的點轉換成相對於指定項目的座標。

span.span: Translates a point relative to this element to coordinates that are relative to the specified element.

returns.span: 點值，現在會相對於目標項目，而不是這個來源項目。

span.span: A point value, now relative to the target element rather than this source element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞`null`針對`relativeTo`允許，而且表示座標應該相對於這個項目所屬的邏輯樹狀結構中的根項目。Passing `null` for `relativeTo` is permitted, and indicates that coordinates should be relative to the root element in the logical tree that this element belongs to. 這個方法用於將轉譯點擊測試點值。This method is used for translating hit test point values. 如果您正在撰寫的控制項，而且需要處理較低層級的輸入，則呼叫這個方法就大致上是相關。Calling this method is mainly relevant if you are authoring a control and need to process input at a lower level. 如果您使用現有的控制項，您通常可以假設已完成的控制項將報表正確轉譯的點擊的測試結果。If you are using existing controls, you can generally assume that completed controls will report correctly translated hit test results.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 確認這個項目的所有視覺化子項目都已正確為配置而更新。

span.span: Ensures that all visual child elements of this element are properly updated for layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫此方法中，使用的項目`false`或是`false`會呼叫項目專用和方法，這會強制版面配置更新，且會驗證所有的計算的大小。When you call this method, elements with `false` or `false` will call element-specific and methods, which forces layout update, and all computed sizes will be validated. 如果配置並未變更，或配置的排列或測量都不狀態無效，則呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。Calling this method has no effect if layout is unchanged, or if neither arrangement nor measurement state of a layout is invalid. 不過，如果在任一方面的配置無效呼叫將會取消復原整個版面配置。However, if layout is invalid in either respect, the call will redo the entire layout. 因此，您應該避免呼叫項目樹狀結構中的每個增量和次要變更後。Therefore, you should avoid calling after each incremental and minor change in the element tree. 版面配置系統會執行項目配置，以延遲方式，使用的演算法來平衡效能與貨幣，並延後到根物件的變更，直到所有的子元素都是有效的加權策略。The layout system will perform element layout in a deferred manner, using an algorithm that balances performance and currency, and with a weighting strategy to defer changes to roots until all child elements are valid. 您應該只呼叫如果一定需要更新的大小和位置，並只確定之後完成控制以及您可能會影響版面配置屬性的所有變更。You should only call if you absolutely need updated sizes and positions, and only after you are certain that all changes to properties that you control and that may affect layout are completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會影響的值影響，其接著可能會引發事件。Setting this property affects the value of , which in turn may raise the event. 不過，有影響其他因素，例如包含它的父代的可見性設定。However, has other factors that influence it, for instance the visibility settings of parents that contain it. 項目所在不是不會參與輸入事件 （或命令） 不會影響版面配置的測量或排列傳遞，是不 索引標籤順序，將不會報告在點擊測試。Elements where is not do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the Measure or Arrange passes of layout, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing. 當繼承或其衍生的類別，重新定義預設值，這個屬性是。When inherited by or its derived classes, redefines the default value of this property to be . 這有不執行上一開始建立的 版面配置的測量傳遞的效果，和傳回 (0，0)。This has the effect of not running the Measure pass of layout on an initially created , and returns (0,0). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see . 也會重新定義預設值是，具有類似的結果行為，如和其衍生的類別。 also redefines the default value to be , with similar resulting behavior for and its derived classes. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會實作參考兩個不同的具名的按鈕要會互斥的配對，使用者介面中的處理常式。The following example implements a handler that references two different named buttons that are intended to be a mutually exclusive pair in the user interface. 在執行之前與按鈕關聯的實際程式邏輯，在按鈕本身設定為，而組配對中的 [其他] 按鈕會設定為。Prior to running the actual program logic associated with the button, the button itself is set to be , and the other button in the pair is set to .
